data.text:
Each wallet is limited to purchases from a minimum of 10 USDT to a maximum of 5000
USDT.
Each wallet purchase will receive 100% of the value quota of DB Token.
If the purchase is successful, DB Token will be issued to your wallet.

After receiving DB Token, 75% of the purchase amount can be exchanged for USDT ortransferred out at any time on the platform, and the remaining 25% must be held for 18 months before it can be exchanged for USDT or transferred out.
